1118556814726004737.text:
What is the price of blockchain security? In PoW, all rewards go to miners. In PoS, they are split between stakers and infrastructure providers.

In this post @FelixLts clears up some misconceptions around staking yields using a current snapshot of data:https://blog.chorus.one/the-truth-about-staking-yields/ …

1107791012586508289.text: With more PoS protocols launching, Staking as a Service ("SaaS") ecosystem will keep expanding. When the cost to run a validator infrastructure is higher than the commission paid to these service providers, one would lean towards delegation to earn token denominated returns.
